name: GraveMiner
description:
Prototype for idea about survival-mining platformer game, with procedurally generated terrain and resources. 

This build contains some basic player movement, one simplistic enemy type, procedurally generated terrain, possibility to destroy terrain and gather three resource types. Build system is missing.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys 

Jump: Space

Attack: Ctrl or X

Debug controls:

Zoom out (toggle) : P

Unfinished build mode (toggle): B

In build mode, place item with mouse.
